root.name: Beyond the Labyrinth
root.description: Beyond the Labyrinth is a first-person dungeon crawler being developed for the 3DS by tri-Ace, and published by Konami. Players will explore maps with up to four party members while leading a white-haired girl through the titular labyrinth.

similar_games.game: Etrian Odyssey II: Heroes of Lagaard
Etrian Odyssey III: The Drowned City
